text: Omo yo, hontoni watashi-tachi wa “anata gata no omo o shinko shi nasai. ” To shinko ni yobu mono no yobigoe o aite, shinko ni hairimashita. Omo yo, watashi-tachi no tsumi o yurusa rete, subete no zaigo o watashi-tachi kara massho shite, shinko no tassei-sha-tachi to issho ni anata ni meshite kudasai
